Title: Handling It: Rune of Shadowbinding
Description:
Lydiara Whisperfeather is an academic who recognizes the rigidity of the rules that govern our world. She also likes bending them.

If there is anyone who can assist in binding Fyr'alath's power, it's her.
ObjectivesText: Seek out Lydiara Whisperfeather in the Azure Span.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Lydiara Whisperfeather in the Azure Span.
